name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Legend of Zelda Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embark on an epic adventure with The Legend of Zelda Live Wallpaper, bringing the magic of Hyrule to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Relive the legend with this beautifully animated theme, featuring iconic visuals from the beloved series. Customize your new tab with ease, quick access, and essential tools.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Step into the world of Zelda with stunning animated scenery.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Navigate your favorite websites in an instant.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Tailor your browsing experience with personalized links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of important dates and times seamlessly.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Explore the web effortlessly with your preferred engine.
Find more gaming-inspired themes, review our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly through the provided options.
